Class Shield

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage
        • com.bartish.twentyfortyeight.shields.Shield
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameShield

    public abstract class Shield
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage
    Add-on over the Stage class for easier work when resizing the screen and storing screen data
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    pixel-pixel
    See Also:
    Stage
